page.title: 06URIOCH FARM
page.content: Urioch is a livestock farm, part of Hensol farms group. It has 600 acres of land; 100 acres of hill land, 30 acres of woodland and the rest is permanant pasture. Each year 80 acres of this is cut for silage and 10 acres for hay. Livestock include 90 suckler cows and calves. There are about 200 sheep and lambs each year. There are 3 milking cows providing sufficient milk for the house and the calves. One new building houses the calves during winter. There they are fattened for selling in the following spring. The lambs are fattened, then sold. Three permanent farm workers are employed who work on all the Hensol farms, each farm having its own manager. Farm buildings are old but in good condition. The surrounding area of the countryside is pleasant.
